title: Ticket #6661: condor_q -global might not not display hold column when needed.
description: when in batch mode, the HOLD column is displayed only if there are held jobs. This works fine unless -global is used, in which case the hold column is displayed only if the first machine we contact has held jobs.
remarks:

the fix is to always show the HOLD column when the -global flag is used.
